title: Welcome to our self-censorship study!

description.part1: To get started, edit <1>src/App.js</1> and save to reload.
description.part2: Switch language between english and german using buttons above.

q1: In the last year, how often have you self-censored your professional expression?
q2: In the last year, how many people you know have had to self-censor themselves?
q3: In the last year, how often have you advised colleagues or students to self-censor themselves?
q4: What is the main source of consequences that you fear that would cause you to self-censor?
q5: In the last year, have you experienced any professional, legal, or violent retaliation for your professional expression?
q6: In the last year, has anybody you know experienced any professional, legal, or violent retaliation for their professional expression?
q7: Compared to last year, are you more or less likely to self-censor your professional expression today?
comments: Do you have any other comments you want to provide about your situation?
